name: get_cities
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool get_60k_radio_stations.
Tool description: More than 68,000 radio stations from different countries and various genres
API description: Fetches a list of cities based on the provided criteria using the RapidAPI service.

country_id.description: The ID of the country to filter cities by. Default is None.

keyword.description: Keyword to filter cities, default is 'Jakarta'.
